siteMetadata.title: My Collection of Markdowns
siteMetadata.description: This is my collection of various documentation.

markdownRemark.html:
List of useful commands for vim editing.

  • q[uit]

  • q[uit]!

  • a : append text after the cursor

  • A : append text at the end of line

  • o : begin a new line below cursor

  • O : begin a new line above cursor

  • dd : delete lines

  • p : put text from register after cursor

  • x : delete character at cursor

  • u : undo changes

  • . : repeat last change

  • gg : goto first line

  • G : goto last line

  • b : step word backward

  • e : step word forward

Search and replace

  • :s/foo/bar/g : replace all foo with bar on current line
